author: Deke Dunne
description: As the name suggests, this is a riff on a Stinger with spirituous Sazerac attitude.
name: Saz with a Sting
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: RINSE chilled glass with rum and set aside
STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into pre-rinsed glass (no ice in glass)
